text: Margit Magnusdóttir Kwao (née Magnusdóttir; born 26 February 1992) is a Faroese footballer who plays as a midfielder. She has been a member of the Faroe Islands women's national team. She is married to Miðvágs Bóltfelag midfielder Solomon A. Kwao, originally from Ghana, whom she has two children with. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Faroese women's footballers Category:People from Miðvágur Category:Faroe Islands women's international footballers Category:Faroese people of Icelandic descent
title: Margit Kwao
